{{official|http://www.xeraco.es}} | footnotes = }} '''Xeraco''' ({{IPA-ca|ʃeˈɾako|va}}, {{lang-es|Jaraco}}) is a [[Municipalities of Spain|municipality]] in the [[Comarques of the Valencian Community|''comarca'']] of [[Safor]] in the [[Valencia (autonomous community)|Valencian Community]], [[Spain]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ive.es/portal/page/portal/IVE_PEGV/CONTENTS/infomun/fichas/cas/Fichas/46143.pdf |title=Ficha municipal Xeraco|year=2011 |work= |publisher= Institut valencià d'estadística |page=1|language=Spanish |trans_title=Municipal sketch Xeraco|accessdate=2012-05-13}}</ref> ==Geography== Xeraco is 57 km to the south from [[Valencia, Spain|Valencia]] city (39° 01' 55" N 0° 12' 56" W). There is about 3 km between the village and the beach. Road: N-332. Highway: AP-7 exit, shared with [[Xeresa]] Railway station: C-1 Line, from Valencia ([[RENFE]]). ==Demographics== {| align="center" rules="all" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4" style="border: 1px solid #999; border-right: 2px solid #999; border-bottom:2px solid #999" |+ style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em"| Demographic Change<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ive.es/portal/page/portal/IVE_PEGV/CONTENTS/infomun/fichas/cas/Fichas/46143.pdf|title=Ficha municipal Xeraco|year=2011 |work= |publisher= Institut valencià d'estadística |page=1|language=Spanish |trans_title=Municipal sketch Xeraco|accessdate=2012-05-13}}</ref> ! 2000 !! 2002 !! 2004 !! 2006 !! 2008 !! 2010 |- | align=center|4.982 || align=center| 5.145 || align=center| 5.443 || align=center| 5.671 || align=center| 6.259 || align=center| 6.129 |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Safor}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of Valencia]] [[Category:Safor]] [[Category:Populated places in the Province of Valencia]] {{valencia-geo-stub}}
